name: Maze for thin
description:
Game I made for a Trijam 3-hour game jam. 

The theme I chose was "Thin borders".

Your goal in this AMAZING game is to reach the portal and escape the dungeon, while competing with other players to see who can do it faster.

To restart the game, simply reload the page.

Controls:

  • W - Increase speed
  • S - Decrease speed
  • A - Rotate direction of movement to the left
  • D - Rotate direction of movement to the right
